Installation

  • Setup

Setup

Open This Bookmark link and copy the text displayed in your browser (cmd+a & cmd+c on OS X, ctrl+a & ctrl+c). Next, create a new bookmark by right-clicking your bookmarks bar and selecting Add Page (Chrome) or New Bookmark (Firefox). Paste in the content you just copied into the url/link field and type a title for the bookmark like MagTool 2.

MagTool is maintained by NAPWebProductionEditTeam.
